scripts.postinstall: rm -r node_modules && cd ../../ && npm install && npx nx sync-deps sandbox && npx nx ensure-symlink sandbox
scripts.test:visual:compare: reg-cli e2e/screenshots e2e/tempScreenshots e2e/diffScreenshots -T 0.002 -R e2e/diffScreenshots/report.html -J e2e/diffScreenshots/result.json
